sentences.en: A fine example has boundless power.
An individual is only a tiny grain in the vast sea; it is the masses of people that are the boundless ocean.
sentences.cn: 个人只是沧海的一粟, 人民群众才是无垠的大海.

sentences.en: But where proponents see boundless opportunity, critics see a catastrophe in the making.
sentences.cn: 赞成者认为这是无限的机会, 但是批评者认为这种事是在制造大灾难.

sentences.en: Derricks are scattered here and there on the boundless plain.
sentences.cn: 在一望无际的原野上散布着一座座井架.

sentences.en: Fifty - two were to roll that afternoon on the lifetide of the city to the boundless sea.
sentences.cn: 五十二个人在那天午后将要被这座城市的生活潮流推荡到无垠的大海里.

sentences.en: Her contentment was boundless, and her method of showing her joy equally expansive.
sentences.cn: 她感到心满意足, 万事如意;她表现欢乐的方法,也同样直截了当,毫无保留.
她那使不完的精力令我羨慕.

sentences.en: In jurisprudence, science, and the arts, man has revealed the boundless magnitude of his mind.
sentences.cn: 在法学 、 科学和人文学科方面, 人类显示出来的智慧也是博大无边的.

sentences.en: May your fortune be as boundless as the East Sea and may you live a long and happy life!
The boundless woods were sleeping in the deep repose of nature.
sentences.cn: 无边无际的森林在大自然静寂的怀抱中酣睡着.

sentences.en: The child's delight was boundless , and Tom's not more moderate.
sentences.cn: 那孩子的欢喜是无穷无尽的; 汤姆的兴致也不相上下.

sentences.en: The masses have boundless creative power.
sentences.cn: 人民群众有无限的创造力.

sentences.en: The work demanded boundless energy and theatrical imagination.
sentences.cn: 这种工作需要具备无限的精力和夸张的想象力。

sentences.en: To the one side of the mountain is the boundless and melancholy marsh.
sentences.cn: 山那边是泥泽,死气沉沉,一望无垠.

sentences.en: Vast is the sky, boundless the wilds.

words.tran_cn: 有义务的；受约束的；装有封面的

trans.tran_cn: 无限的，无穷的，无边际的，广阔的
